Week of October 21, 2013 The latest Industry News, Features, and Blog Posts for goPivotal.com
FEATURED>>
Strata + Hadoop World 2013
>> Pivotal will be featuring our latest Hadoop innovations, including the brand new capabilities of Pivotal HD. Join us and talk one-on-one with our big data specialists about our recent announcements at next week's Strata + Hadoop World. Learn more >><http://strataconf.com/stratany2013>
LATEST BLOG POSTS>>
>> Why Pivotal’s Xtreme Labs Acquisition is a Game Changer for Mobile Apps + Big Data
Having built mobile applications for over 400 customers including Viacom, Shutterstock, Mountain Equipment Coop, Bell, Viggle, Xtreme Labs has seen a fundamental shift in the mobile space. In this post, Xtreme Labs founders Sundeep (Sunny) Madra and Amar Varma share how they got started with the help of Pivotal Labs back in 2007, and why today it makes so much sense for these companies to combine efforts >> <http://blog.gopivotal.com/features/why-pivotals-xtreme-labs-acquisition-is-a-game-changer-for-mobile-apps-big-data>
>> Pivotal and VentureBeat Present DataBeat Data Science Summit 2013
Despite the Big Data hype, data science poses some of the greatest challenges — and opportunities — before enterprises today. Beyond the buzzwords, there remains a reality that businesses must embrace to stay relevant, competitive, and innovative. DataBeat’s Data Science Summit 2013, a partnership between Pivotal and VentureBeat, addresses this reality, offering deep dives into the data-driven enterprise from many of the leading practitioners in the space >> <http://blog.gopivotal.com/news-2/pivotal-and-venturebeat-present-databeat-data-science-summit-2013>
